original_text: No one, then, should treat him with contempt. Send him on his way in peace so that he may return to me. I am expecting him along with the brothers.
korean_text: 그러므로 누구든지 그를 멸시하지 말고 평안히 보내어 내게로 오게 하라 나는 그가 형제들과 함께 오기를 기다리노라

sentences.original_text: No one, then, should treat him with contempt
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 아무도 그를 멸시해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: Send him on his way in peace
so that he may return to me
I am expecting him along with the brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 형제들과 함께 그를 기다리고 있습니다
